text: Great piece about fashion and how it speaks for you in tech, and not always in a good way if you are a woman/femme presenting. https://t.co/ACA6OjnlIf

author.name: Morgan Harris
author.description: Account + Engagement Manager @redmonk. Mostly reposts, likes, and lurking on tech, fashion, and doula-ing by way of the Combahee River Collective statement.
